title: Advertisement least likely appeal to which group

content.prompt: The ideas in the advertisement most likely had limited appeal for which of the following groups?

choices.label: Managers and professionals employed by corporations
Rebellious young people uncomfortable with conformity

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
